Package com.distrimind.bouncycastle.cms

Class CMSEnvelopedData

java.lang.Object
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.cms.CMSEnvelopedData
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.util.Encodable
public class CMSEnvelopedData
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.distrimind.bouncycastle.util.Encodable
containing class for an CMS Enveloped Data object

Example of use - assuming the first recipient matches the private key we have. 

      CMSEnvelopedData     ed = new CMSEnvelopedData(inputStream);

      RecipientInformationStore  recipients = ed.getRecipientInfos();

      Collection  c = recipients.getRecipients();
      Iterator    it = c.iterator();

      if (it.hasNext())
      {
          RecipientInformation   recipient = (RecipientInformation)it.next();

          byte[] recData = recipient.getContent(new JceKeyTransEnvelopedRecipient(privateKey).setProvider("BC"));

          processData(recData);
      }
